basic_information.scholarship_name: Carl F. Reherman Endowed Scholarship in Political Science

description: In celebration of Dr. Reherman's 30 years to UCO, not only as a non-traditional student, but as a professor and administrator, a scholarship was created in his name. The family wanted to honor Carl and reflect who he was by awarding a Political Science student who is following in his footsteps. Eligibility Requirements  Political Science major  Must have completed 60 credit hours  Minimum 3.0 GPA  Undergraduate student  Preference given to an employed student taking a minimum of 6 hours  Preference given to veterans, single parents, and/or non-traditional students  Must provide a personal statement of 2 pages max explaining employment, background, and life goals including career goals
